name: webdriverio-page
description: Page extendable class for running webdriver.io tests

scripts.npm:pubtest: set -uex; npm test; npm version prerelease; npm publish --tag testing
scripts.npm:publish: set -uex; npm run test:coverage; [ -z "$(git status --porcelain)" ]; npm version patch; git push; npm publish; git push --tags

author: Matt Hoyle <code at deployable.co>
